recipesJson.name: Leaf Candy
recipesJson.author: XxBulldogIrishxX
recipesJson.description: In search of a nice cold minty Candy...Lower the ws23 if it's to high...I'm very high tolerance to the cooling so what is high for most is to low for me..Or just leave it out totally and enjoy just the mint flavors without the ICE

reviews.text: This is seriously excellent. It’s too bad us menthol users are in the minority because this should have more ratings. I was worried at first the spearmint would be too forward as I’m not a huge spearmint fan. It’s not. This balances perfectly. Mixed up at 80/20 it’s nice and smooth has a nice mouth feel. I thought it was going to need marshmallow or something and it just doesn’t. I may try a drop of shisha vanilla next time for fun
